turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi. I need to order from Bella Luna.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok. what did you want to order from Bella Luna?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay, what did you want to order from Bella Luna? Just give me 1 second, I need to put my headphones on.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want to order four small pizzas.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: got it, what toppings did you want on those?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Let's go two Hawaiian and two just cheese only.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, what kind of crust would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: thin.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: 4 small pizzas all with thin crust, 2 hawaiian and 2 cheese.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: is that right?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yep. Yep. And then, could I get extra cheese on all four?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, i've added extra cheese to all 4 pizzas. $45.54 is the total.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: did you want me to place the order now?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok. i've submitted the order. it'll be ready for pick up in 35 mins.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: do you need anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Oh, that will be it.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great, take care.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you.
